decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing property.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, SID1/101 (in so far as it relates to the 3D image), SID1/102 and  SID/1/1/2 received on 01/11/2016. SID1/1/3 received on 07/12/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side and rear walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwellings known as 95 and 95A Standard Road, Hounslow TW4 7AY.
description: Following the demolition of the existing outbuilding the erection of an outbuilding for use as two store rooms and erection of a fence.
